name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench, grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width, lower to chest, then press up.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, grip bar wider than shoulders, lower to upper chest, press up.

name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Set bench to decline, secure feet, lower bar to lower chest, press up.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on bench with dumbbells at chest level, press up while keeping wrists straight.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, press dumbbells from chest to full extension.

name: Dumbbell Fly
instructions: Lie on bench, extend arms above chest, lower with slight bend in elbows, squeeze chest to return.

name: Incline Dumbbell Fly
instructions: On incline bench, perform fly motion to target upper chest.

name: Cable Fly
instructions: Stand between cables set at chest height, bring handles together in front of chest.

name: Cable Crossover
instructions: Set cables high, step forward, bring handles down and across your body.

name: Chest Press Machine
instructions: Sit with back flat, grip handles, press forward until arms are extended.

name: Pec Deck
instructions: Sit with arms on pads, squeeze pads together in front of chest.

name: Push-Up
instructions: Hands shoulder-width apart, lower chest to ground, push back up.

name: Barbell Row
instructions: Bend over with flat back, pull bar to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades.

name: Pendlay Row
instructions: Start with bar on floor each rep, explosively row to chest, return to floor.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width, grip bar outside legs, drive through heels to stand.

name: Pull-Up
instructions: Grip bar overhand, pull until chin clears bar, lower with control.

name: Chin-Up
instructions: Grip bar underhand, pull until chin clears bar, emphasizes biceps more.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Grip bar wider than shoulders, pull to upper chest, squeeze lats.

name: Close-Grip Lat Pulldown
instructions: Use close-grip attachment, pull to chest while keeping elbows close.

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Sit with feet braced, pull handle to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades.

name: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
instructions: Knee and hand on bench, row dumbbell to hip, keep back flat.

name: T-Bar Row
instructions: Straddle bar, grip handle, row to chest while keeping back flat.

name: Chest Supported Row
instructions: Lie face down on incline bench, row dumbbells to sides.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Set cable at face height, pull rope to face while externally rotating shoulders.

name: Straight-Arm Pulldown
instructions: Keep arms straight, pull bar down to thighs, focus on lat contraction.

name: Dead Hang
instructions: Hang from bar with straight arms, engage shoulders, hold for time.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Grip bar at shoulders, press overhead until arms are locked out.

name: Seated Dumbbell Press
instructions: Sit with back supported, press dumbbells from shoulders to overhead.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Start with palms facing you, rotate as you press overhead.

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, raise to shoulder height with slight bend in elbows.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand sideways to cable, raise arm to shoulder height.

name: Front Raise
instructions: Raise dumbbells in front to shoulder height, lower with control.

name: Reverse Fly
instructions: Bend over, raise dumbbells out to sides, squeeze shoulder blades.

name: Cable Reverse Fly
instructions: Stand between cables set low, raise arms out to sides.

name: Upright Row
instructions: Grip bar close, pull up to chin, elbows high.

name: Shrugs
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, shrug shoulders up toward ears.

name: Barbell Shrugs
instructions: Hold barbell at thighs, shrug shoulders up, hold at top.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Grip bar underhand, curl to shoulders, keep elbows at sides.

name: EZ Bar Curl
instructions: Grip EZ bar on angled portions, curl with controlled motion.

name: Dumbbell Curl
instructions: Curl dumbbells alternating or together, supinate at top.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Curl with palms facing each other throughout movement.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
instructions: Lie on incline bench, curl dumbbells with full stretch at bottom.

name: Concentration Curl
instructions: Sit with elbow braced on inner thigh, curl with focus on peak contraction.

name: Preacher Curl
instructions: Rest arms on preacher pad, curl bar up, control the negative.

name: Cable Curl
instructions: Attach bar to low cable, curl with constant tension.

name: Spider Curl
instructions: Lie face down on incline bench, curl dumbbells for peak contraction.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
instructions: Grip bar shoulder-width or closer, lower to chest, press up.

name: Skull Crusher
instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to forehead by bending elbows, extend back up.

name: Tricep Pushdown
instructions: Grip bar with elbows at sides, push down until arms are straight.

name: Rope Pushdown
instructions: Use rope attachment, push down and spread rope at bottom.

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head by bending elbows, extend up.

name: Cable Overhead Extension
instructions: Face away from cable, extend arms overhead.

name: Dips
instructions: Support on parallel bars, lower body by bending elbows, press back up.

name: Diamond Push-Up
instructions: Hands together forming diamond shape, perform push-up.

name: Tricep Kickback
instructions: Bend over with upper arm parallel to floor, extend forearm back.

name: Barbell Squat
instructions: Bar on upper back, feet shoulder-width, squat until thighs parallel, drive up.

name: Front Squat
instructions: Bar on front delts, elbows high, squat with upright torso.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Feet shoulder-width on platform, lower sled, press back up.

name: Hack Squat
instructions: Shoulders under pads, squat down and up along fixed track.

name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit with pad on shins, extend legs straight, squeeze quads.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Rear foot elevated on bench, lunge down on front leg.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat between legs, drive up.

name: Walking Lunge
instructions: Step forward into lunge, alternate legs while walking.

name: Sissy Squat
instructions: Hold support, lean back while bending knees, isolates quads.

name: Smith Machine Squat
instructions: Bar on upper back in Smith machine, squat with controlled path.

name: Wall Sit
instructions: Back flat against wall, slide down until thighs are parallel to floor, hold position.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Slight knee bend, hinge at hips, lower bar along legs, squeeze glutes to return.

name: Stiff-Leg Deadlift
instructions: Keep legs nearly straight, hinge forward, feel hamstring stretch.

name: Lying Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down, curl pad toward glutes, control the negative.

name: Seated Leg Curl
instructions: Sit with pad behind ankles, curl legs under, squeeze hamstrings.

name: Good Morning
instructions: Bar on upper back, hinge forward with slight knee bend, return upright.

name: Dumbbell RDL
instructions: Hold dumbbells, perform Romanian deadlift with each arm.

name: Nordic Hamstring Curl
instructions: Kneel with ankles secured, lower body forward, hamstrings control descent.

name: Single-Leg RDL
instructions: Balance on one leg, hinge forward while extending other leg back.

name: Hip Thrust
instructions: Upper back on bench, bar on hips, drive hips up, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back, feet flat, drive hips up, squeeze glutes.

name: Cable Kickback
instructions: Attach ankle strap to low cable, kick leg straight back.

name: Hip Abduction Machine
instructions: Sit with pads on outer thighs, push legs apart.

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Wide stance, toes out, grip inside legs, drive through heels.

name: Step-Up
instructions: Step onto elevated surface, drive through heel, step down with control.

name: Frog Pump
instructions: Lie on back, soles of feet together, thrust hips up.

name: Standing Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on platform, raise heels as high as possible, lower with stretch.

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit with pad on thighs, raise heels, targets soleus muscle.

name: Leg Press Calf Raise
instructions: Position toes on edge of leg press platform, extend and flex ankles.

name: Smith Machine Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on elevated surface in Smith machine, raise and lower heels.

name: Single-Leg Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on one leg on edge of step, raise and lower heel.

name: Donkey Calf Raise
instructions: Bend at hips with pad on lower back, raise heels.

name: Crunch
instructions: Lie on back, hands behind head, curl shoulders toward pelvis.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs to parallel or higher.

name: Cable Crunch
instructions: Kneel facing cable, crunch down bringing elbows to knees.

name: Plank
instructions: Hold push-up position on forearms, keep body straight.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Support body on one forearm and side of foot, keep body in straight line, hold for time.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Kneel with wheel, roll out extending body, roll back.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit with feet elevated, rotate torso side to side with or without weight.

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on back, alternate bringing elbow to opposite knee.

name: Leg Raise
instructions: Lie on back, raise legs to vertical, lower with control.

name: Mountain Climber
instructions: In push-up position, rapidly alternate driving knees to chest.

name: Dead Bug
instructions: Lie on back, extend opposite arm and leg while keeping back flat.

name: Decline Sit-Up
instructions: Secure feet on decline bench, sit up with control.

name: Pallof Press
instructions: Stand sideways to cable, press handle away from chest, resist rotation.

name: L-Sit
instructions: Support body on parallel bars or floor, lift legs straight out in front, hold for time.

name: Wrist Curl
instructions: Rest forearms on thighs, palms up, curl weight with wrists.

name: Reverse Wrist Curl
instructions: Rest forearms on thighs, palms down, extend wrists up.

name: Farmer's Walk
instructions: Hold heavy dumbbells at sides, walk with upright posture.

name: Suitcase Carry
instructions: Hold heavy dumbbell in one hand at side, walk keeping torso upright and level.

name: Trap Bar Deadlift
instructions: Stand inside trap bar, grip handles, drive through heels to stand.

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Hinge at hips, swing kettlebell between legs, snap hips to swing up.

name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold kettlebell at chest, squat deep, drive up.

name: Kettlebell Turkish Get-Up
instructions: Lie down with kettlebell extended, stand up while keeping arm vertical.

name: Decline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to decline, press dumbbells from chest to full extension.

name: Dumbbell Floor Press
instructions: Lie on floor with dumbbells, press up stopping when elbows touch ground.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
instructions: Lie on bench, hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head in arc, pull back over chest.

name: Smith Machine Bench Press
instructions: Lie on flat bench under Smith machine, unrack bar, lower to chest, press up.

name: Smith Machine Incline Bench Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees under Smith machine, lower bar to upper chest, press up.

name: Decline Push-Up
instructions: Feet elevated on bench, hands on floor, perform push-up targeting upper chest.

name: Low Cable Fly
instructions: Set cables low, bring handles up and together in front of chest targeting upper chest.

name: Single-Arm Cable Fly
instructions: Stand sideways to cable, bring single handle across body squeezing chest.

name: Rack Pull
instructions: Set barbell at knee height in rack, grip and stand up focusing on upper back.

name: Inverted Row
instructions: Hang under bar with body straight, pull chest to bar, lower with control.

name: Seal Row
instructions: Lie face down on elevated bench, row dumbbells from full hang to sides.

name: Meadows Row
instructions: Stand perpendicular to landmine, row with one arm pulling to hip.

name: Back Extension
instructions: Lock feet in hyperextension bench, lower torso, extend back up to straight.

name: Neutral-Grip Lat Pulldown
instructions: Use neutral-grip handle, pull to upper chest, squeeze lats.

name: Single-Arm Lat Pulldown
instructions: Use single handle, pull down to shoulder with one arm, focus on lat stretch.

name: Single-Arm Cable Row
instructions: Stand or sit at cable station, row with one arm to hip.

name: Smith Machine Row
instructions: Bend over in Smith machine, row bar to lower chest with controlled path.

name: Rope Pulldown
instructions: Keep arms straight, pull rope down to thighs focusing on lat contraction.

name: Iliac Pulldown
instructions: Lean back slightly, pull cable handle to hip level targeting lower lats with full stretch at top.

name: Machine Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit with back supported, press handles overhead until arms are extended.

name: Machine Lateral Raise
instructions: Sit with arms against pads, raise to shoulder height.

name: Reverse Machine Fly
instructions: Sit facing pec deck, push handles apart squeezing rear delts.

name: Landmine Press
instructions: Hold end of barbell at shoulder, press up and forward.

name: Behind the Neck Press
instructions: Lower bar behind head to ear level, press back up. Requires good shoulder mobility.

name: Cable Front Raise
instructions: Face away from low cable, raise handle to shoulder height in front.

name: Dumbbell Rear Delt Row
instructions: Bend over, row dumbbells with elbows flared wide to target rear delts.

name: Smith Machine Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit under Smith machine, press bar overhead along guided path.

name: Smith Machine Shrugs
instructions: Hold Smith machine bar at thighs, shrug shoulders up toward ears.

name: Push Press
instructions: Slight knee dip then explosively press barbell overhead using leg drive.

name: Drag Curl
instructions: Curl bar keeping it close to body, drag up along torso with elbows back.

name: Zottman Curl
instructions: Curl up with palms up, rotate to palms down at top, lower slowly.

name: Reverse Barbell Curl
instructions: Grip bar overhand, curl to shoulders keeping wrists straight.

name: Machine Bicep Curl
instructions: Sit with arms on pad, curl handles toward shoulders.

name: Cable Rope Curl
instructions: Attach rope to low cable, curl with neutral grip, spread rope at top.

name: Overhead Cable Curl
instructions: Stand between high cables, curl handles toward head with arms extended.

name: Cross-Body Hammer Curl
instructions: Curl dumbbell across body toward opposite shoulder with neutral grip.

name: Bayesian Curl
instructions: Face away from low cable, arm behind body, curl handle forward.

name: Bench Dip
instructions: Hands on bench behind you, lower body by bending elbows, press back up.

name: Dumbbell Skull Crusher
instructions: Lie on bench, lower dumbbells to sides of forehead, extend back up.

name: Single-Arm Cable Pushdown
instructions: Use single handle, push down with one arm keeping elbow at side.

name: Machine Tricep Extension
instructions: Sit with elbows on pad, extend arms until straight.

name: Tate Press
instructions: Lie on bench, start with dumbbells extended, lower to chest by bending elbows inward, press up.

name: EZ Bar Overhead Extension
instructions: Hold EZ bar overhead, lower behind head by bending elbows, extend back up.

name: Pendulum Squat
instructions: Stand on platform, shoulders under pads, squat through pendulum arc.

name: Belt Squat
instructions: Attach belt to weight, stand on platforms, squat with no spinal load.

name: Zercher Squat
instructions: Hold barbell in crook of elbows, squat keeping torso upright.

name: Pistol Squat
instructions: Stand on one leg, squat down with other leg extended forward, stand back up.

name: Box Squat
instructions: Squat to a box behind you, pause briefly, drive back up.

name: Barbell Lunge
instructions: Bar on upper back, step forward into lunge, drive back up.

name: Reverse Lunge
instructions: Hold dumbbells, step backward into lunge, drive forward to stand.

name: Jump Squat
instructions: Squat down then explosively jump, land softly and repeat.

name: Landmine Squat
instructions: Hold end of landmine barbell at chest, squat down and drive up.

name: Single-Leg Leg Extension
instructions: Perform leg extension one leg at a time to address imbalances.

name: Glute Ham Raise
instructions: Lock feet in GHD, lower torso forward, curl back up using hamstrings.

name: Standing Leg Curl
instructions: Stand on one leg, curl other leg against pad toward glutes.

name: Single-Leg Lying Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down, curl one leg at a time for unilateral hamstring work.

name: Cable Pull Through
instructions: Face away from low cable, hinge at hips, pull cable through legs by extending hips.

name: Kettlebell Single-Leg RDL
instructions: Hold kettlebell, balance on one leg, hinge forward extending other leg back.

name: Hip Thrust Machine
instructions: Sit in machine, drive hips up against pad, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Smith Machine Hip Thrust
instructions: Upper back on bench, bar across hips in Smith machine, drive hips up.

name: Single-Leg Hip Thrust
instructions: Upper back on bench, extend one leg, thrust hips up on single leg.

name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back, extend one leg, drive hips up on single leg.

name: Reverse Hyperextension
instructions: Lie face down on machine, raise legs behind you squeezing glutes.

name: Cossack Squat
instructions: Wide stance, shift weight to one side squatting deep, alternate sides.

name: Lateral Band Walk
instructions: Band around legs, half squat position, step sideways maintaining tension.

name: Machine Glute Kickback
instructions: Stand in machine, kick one leg back against pad squeezing glute.

name: Barbell Calf Raise
instructions: Bar on upper back, stand on edge of platform, raise and lower heels.

name: Tibialis Raise
instructions: Lean back against wall, raise toes toward shins to strengthen tibialis.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
instructions: Hang from bar, raise knees to chest with control, lower slowly.

name: Cable Wood Chop
instructions: Stand sideways to cable set high, chop diagonally across body rotating torso.

name: Hollow Hold
instructions: Lie on back, lift shoulders and legs off ground, hold hollow body position.

name: Dragon Flag
instructions: Lie on bench gripping behind head, raise body straight, lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Side Bend
instructions: Hold dumbbell in one hand, bend sideways, return to upright.

name: Machine Crunch
instructions: Sit in machine, crunch forward against resistance, control the return.

name: Oblique Crunch
instructions: Lie on side, crunch up bringing shoulder toward hip.

name: Sit-Up
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent, sit all the way up, lower with control.

name: Weighted Plank
instructions: Hold plank position with weight plate on back for added resistance.

name: Landmine Rotation
instructions: Hold end of landmine barbell, rotate from side to side with arms extended.

name: Dumbbell Wrist Curl
instructions: Rest forearm on thigh, palm up, curl dumbbell with wrist.

name: Plate Pinch Hold
instructions: Pinch weight plates together with fingers, hold for time.
